text: Cheshmeh-Ali (meaning:Ali's spring) is a natural and swimming spring in Rey, Iran. The spring is located south of Tehran. Cheshmeh-Ali is run from a big rock and flown to south-east. Cheshmeh-Ali dates back 8,000 years ago and is placed under Rey Castle. Inscription of Fath Ali Shah is between Rey Castle and Cheshmeh-Ali from top to down. == Resources == * ČAŠMA(-YE) ʿALĪ iranicaonline.org Category:Bodies of water of Asia Category:Tehran Province
title: Cheshmeh-Ali (Shahr-e-Rey)
